medium: Color etching, linocut, woodcut, lithograph, screenprint and aquatint
title: The Singing Bridge
marks: Signature, date, chop mark Lower center: [Steven Sorman/1980]
description: Large square grid with juxtaposing green rectangle in LL and LRQs, and square black table in its center; red horizontal and vertical stripes along upper margin; blue horizontal and vertical stripes along bottom margin
creditline: Vermillion Archival Collection, Gift of funds from The Northern Star Foundation and The Hersey Foundation
